clinical_study.brief_title: Precision Cell Immunotherapy Combined With Chemotherapy in Advanced Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study Using Precision Cell Immunotherapy Combined With Chemotherapy in Advanced Lung Cancer

brief_summary.textblock:
To evaluate the safety and effectiveness of cell therapy using Precision Cell Immunotherapy to treat Advanced Lung Cancer.
Eligibility:
Individuals greater than or equal to 18 years of age and less than or equal to 65 years of age who have been diagnosed with Advanced Lung Cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 40 patients may be enrolled over a period of 1-2 years.
